hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: We are building a new generation digital platform for the world

intro.paragraph1: We are building a new generation digital platform for the world, where social networking, content, commerce, and communication are no longer fragmented.
intro.paragraph2: We believe that truly valuable connections begin with trust between people, extend to content resonance, and ultimately transform into sustainable business relationships.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: We are an international social + e-commerce + instant messaging platform. Users can discover content, build relationships, communicate in real-time, and naturally complete transactions here.
whoWeAre.point1: Social is not just interaction, but the building of long-term relationships
whoWeAre.point2: Content is not just expression, but the transmission of value
whoWeAre.point3: E-commerce is not just buying and selling, but the result of trust
whoWeAre.point4: Instant messaging is not an accessory feature, but the core link that connects everything

problemsWeSolve.title: What Problems Are We Solving
problemsWeSolve.problem1: In today's internet world, social platforms excel at creating interactions but struggle to handle transactions;
problemsWeSolve.problem2: E-commerce platforms efficiently complete transactions but lack genuine relationships;
problemsWeSolve.problem3: Instant messaging tools connect people but remain outside the business ecosystem.
problemsWeSolve.solution: We seek to break down these boundaries.
problemsWeSolve.point1: Discover products within genuine social relationships
problemsWeSolve.point2: Form purchase decisions through content and discussion
problemsWeSolve.point3: Complete trust building and transaction closure through instant communication

platformPhilosophy.title: Our Platform Philosophy
platformPhilosophy.description: People-centered, not traffic-centered. We respect the differences in languages, cultures, and markets. The platform has been designed for internationalization from the start, supporting users from different regions, languages, and usage habits to connect freely.
platformPhilosophy.point2: Ordinary users participate in commercial value through social networking
platformPhilosophy.point3: Sellers acquire users through genuine relationships rather than advertisements
platformPhilosophy.footer: Every interaction can create new value.

ourVision.title: What We Hope to Become
ourVision.description: We are not just a platform, but a digital community that transcends languages and regions.
ourVision.footer1: And gain long-term returns from it
ourVision.footer2: This is a shared space belonging to users, creators, and merchants.

weAreMovingForward.title: We Are Moving Forward
weAreMovingForward.description: We are still continuously iterating and growing, but the direction is always clear: make social networking more authentic, make e-commerce more trustworthy, and make connections more valuable.

purpose.title: Purpose of Deposit
purpose.content: Deposit is a system established by the platform to protect buyer rights. When a seller's unfilled order total exceeds the free deposit credit provided by their subscription tier, additional deposit is required to ensure sellers can fulfill their order commitments.

subscription.title: Subscription Tiers and Free Deposit Credit
subscription.content: Your subscription fee equals the free deposit credit. Higher subscription tiers provide higher free deposit credit, supporting more unfilled orders.

trigger.title: Deposit Trigger Conditions
trigger.content: When your unfilled order total (paid but uncompleted/shipped/pending orders) exceeds the free deposit credit provided by your current subscription tier, the system will require you to pay additional deposit.
trigger.formulaDetail: Required Deposit = Unfilled Order Total - Subscription Tier (Free Deposit Credit)

status.title: Deposit Status Explanation
status.requiredDesc: The system has detected that you need to pay deposit. Please complete payment as soon as possible to restore product sales functionality.
status.heldDesc: Deposit has been paid and held. Your product sales functionality has been restored.
status.refundableDesc: After orders are completed, deposit can be refunded after 3 business days.
status.refundingDesc: Your refund request is being processed.
status.refundedDesc: Deposit has been successfully refunded to your account.
status.forfeitedDesc: Deposit has been used to compensate buyers, usually in cases of order disputes where the seller is at fault.

refund.title: Deposit Refund Rules
refund.content: When your unfilled order total drops below the subscription tier and all related orders are completed (status is completed or refunded), the deposit will become refundable after 3 business days.
refund.note: Refunds will deduct payment channel fees. The actual amount received may be slightly less than the original deposit amount.

upgrade.title: Subscription Upgrade Recommendation
upgrade.content: If you frequently need to pay additional deposits, consider upgrading to a higher subscription tier. Higher tiers provide larger free deposit credit, reducing the frequency of additional deposit payments.

pay.title: Pay Deposit

noDeposit.title: No Deposit Required
noDeposit.description: Your current unfilled order total does not exceed the subscription tier. No additional deposit is required.

pay.warning: After paying the deposit, your product sales functionality will be restored immediately. Deposit can be refunded after orders are completed.

welcome.title: Welcome to Stratos!
welcome.description: We are an integrated platform combining social networking, e-commerce, and instant messaging. Let's explore the powerful features together.

discover.title: Discover Great Content
discover.description: Browse and discover interesting content on the homepage. Follow users you're interested in, like, comment and share to interact with others.

create.title: Create Your Content
create.description: Create and share your thoughts, images, and videos. Use topic tags to help more people discover your content.

shop.title: Browse Marketplace
shop.description: Discover featured products in the marketplace. Find products within genuine social relationships and make purchase decisions through content discussion.

message.title: Instant Messaging
message.description: Chat with friends in real-time and build genuine social relationships. Complete trust building and transaction closure through instant communication.

seller.title: Start Selling
seller.description: Create your first product and start selling online. Once you become a seller, you can manage products and orders in the seller center.

affiliate.title: Start Promoting
affiliate.description: Choose products to promote and earn commissions. Once you become an affiliate, you can view earnings and statistics in the affiliate center.

metadata.title: Stratos - Social E-commerce Platform
metadata.description: An integrated platform combining social networking, e-commerce, and instant messaging
